org.apache.flink.yarn

类 Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that provides helper methods to work with Apache Hadoop YARN.

    • 字段概要

      • setupLocalResource

        static Tuple2<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.LocalResource> setupLocalResource(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String appId,
                                                                                                             org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path localSrcPath,
                                                                                                             org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path homedir,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String relativeTargetPath)
                                                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a local file to a remote file system.
        参数:
        fs - remote filesystem
        appId - application ID
        localSrcPath - path to the local file
        homedir - remote home directory base (will be extended)
        relativeTargetPath - relative target path of the file (will be prefixed be the full home directory we set up)
        返回:
        Path to remote file (usually hdfs)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • addToEnvironment

        public static void addToEnvironment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> environment,
                                    java.lang.String variable,
                                    java.lang.String value)
        Copied method from org.apache.hadoop.yarn.util.Apps. It was broken by YARN-1824 (2.4.0) and fixed for 2.4.1 by https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-1931

      • getEnvironmentVariables

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEnvironmentVariables(java.lang.String envPrefix,
                                                                                       Configuration flinkConfiguration)
        Method to extract environment variables from the flinkConfiguration based on the given prefix String.
        参数:
        envPrefix - Prefix for the environment variables key
        flinkConfiguration - The Flink config to get the environment variable defintion from

      • createTaskExecutorContext

        static org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ContainerLaunchContext createTaskExecutorContext(Configuration flinkConfig,
                                                                                           org.apache.hadoop.yarn.conf.YarnConfiguration yarnConfig,
                                                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> env,
                                                                                           ContaineredTaskManagerParameters tmParams,
                                                                                           Configuration taskManagerConfig,
                                                                                           java.lang.String workingDirectory,
                                                                                           java.lang.Class<?> taskManagerMainClass,
                                                                                           org.slf4j.Logger log)
                                                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the launch context, which describes how to bring up a TaskExecutor / TaskManager process in an allocated YARN container.

        This code is extremely YARN specific and registers all the resources that the TaskExecutor needs (such as JAR file, config file, ...) and all environment variables in a YARN container launch context. The launch context then ensures that those resources will be copied into the containers transient working directory.

        参数:
        flinkConfig - The Flink configuration object.
        yarnConfig - The YARN configuration object.
        env - The environment variables.
        tmParams - The TaskExecutor container memory parameters.
        taskManagerConfig - The configuration for the TaskExecutors.
        workingDirectory - The current application master container's working directory.
        taskManagerMainClass - The class with the main method.
        log - The logger.
        返回:
        The launch context for the TaskManager processes.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if teh launch context could not be created, for example if the resources could not be copied.

      • require

        static void require(boolean condition,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.Object... values)
        Validates a condition, throwing a RuntimeException if the condition is violated.
        参数:
        condition - The condition.
        message - The message for the runtime exception, with format variables as defined by String.format(String, Object...).
        values - The format arguments.
